# Weyl AI - LLM Information

This site provides documentation and API access for Weyl inference infrastructure.

## Quick Links

- Full Documentation: https://weyl.ai/llms-full.txt
- Agent Instructions: https://weyl.ai/agents.md
- API Specification: https://weyl.ai/openapi.json
- Structured Index: https://weyl.ai/docs.json

## What is Weyl?

Weyl provides purpose-built inference infrastructure for generative media:
- Sub-100ms latency image generation
- FLUX.2, FLUX.1, Z-Image Turbo, WAN Video models
- Sync and Async API tiers
- Integration with Cursor, Claude, v0, Lovable, Bolt

## For AI Agents

See https://weyl.ai/agents.md for detailed agent instructions.
